ModMetaData.name: More Wound Healing Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/unix22b/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Gene icons made by Moka. You can check out their mods here![/url]
This adds 4 more choices for wound healing genes. Details are below. I've done so many of these by this point that I can't think of anything new to say about this one.
[url=https://discord.gg/fYP8qkcNDh]Discord link[/url] for those who want an easier way to ask questions, make requests, or just chat. I'll also be posting new releases there.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/alite/myworkshopfiles/?appid=294100]Easy link to all of my Rimworld mods[/url]
[url=https://github.com/KonradHeinser/MoreWoundHealingGenes][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url] [url=https://ko-fi.com/alite56114][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url]
Specific Numbers Very slow wound healing - +3 bio, 25% injury healing rate Below average wound healing - +1 bio, 75% injury healing rate Above average wound healing - -1 bio, 150% injury healing rate Extreme wound healing - 2 Complexity, -4 bio, 600% injury healing rate
